skills.title: Back-End

portfolio.title: Booki
portfolio.description: Responsive website of a travel agency developed in HTML and CSS, that allows customers to find accommodation and activities in the city they are looking for.

portfolio.title: Sophie Bluel
portfolio.description: This project involves creating a dynamic webpage for an interior designer using JavaScript, focusing on user interactions, DOM manipulation, and API communication.

portfolio.title: Nina Carducci
portfolio.description: Improve the SEO, performance and accessibility of a website by identifying problems and applying fixes, using tools such as Chrome Dev Tools, Lighthouse and Wave.

portfolio.title: Kasa
portfolio.description: This project involves building the front-end of a real estate rental app using React, React Router, and Vite, focusing on dynamic UI development, page navigation, and styling with Sass.

portfolio.title: Mon Vieux Grimoire
portfolio.description: This project involves developing the back-end of a book rating site using, Node.js, Express and MongoDB, implementing CRUD operations, secure authentication, and image handling. It follows an MVC architecture and uses Mongoose for data modeling.
